    • Highlights

    • The Navagraha Temple Darshan Tour focuses on visiting nine temples, each dedicated to one of the celestial deities representing the planets.
    • Experience the unique rituals and architecture of each temple, with deep cultural and astrological significance.
    • Begin your journey with the Sun and Moon temples, exploring their influence on life and nature.
    • Visit the Mars, Mercury, and Jupiter temples, learning about their role in Indian astrology and mythology.
    • Continue with Venus, Saturn, Rahu, and Ketu temples, each offering distinct traditions and practices.
    • This spiritual journey offers insights into Indian astrology and an opportunity to engage with the sacred practices surrounding the Navagraha deities.

    Navagraha Temple Darshan Tour - 3 Nights / 4 Days

    Day 1: Arrival and Temple Visits

    • Arrive at the destination and transfer to your hotel.
    • Begin your darshan with visits to the Sun and Moon temples.
    • Evening free for personal time or local sightseeing.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel.

    Day 2: Temple Circuit Tour

    • Visit temples dedicated to Mars, Mercury, and Jupiter.
    • Learn about the cultural and astrological significance of each temple.
    • Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

    Day 3: Continued Temple Visits

    • Explore temples for Venus, Saturn, and Rahu.
    • Discover the unique traditions and rituals observed at each temple.
    • Return to the hotel for a restful evening and overnight stay.

    Day 4: Final Temple Visit and Departure

    • Complete your pilgrimage with a visit to the Ketu temple.
    • Transfer to the airport or railway station for onward journey.
    • End of the Navagraha Temple Darshan Tour.
